AR MAX Codes
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher EVO Archive (PS2): Cheat Device Codes & Info: AR MAX Codes
By Scorpio Maurus on Sunday, August 6, 2006 - 12:30 pm:

Once again for anyone as unforunate as me to have only AR MAX here are some codes to give you a Maxed Monster. Note in all previous the max stats were 999 so thats what the premade AR MAX codes give you. In EVO max stats are 9,999 so these codes actually give you that.

By Scorpio Maurus on Sunday, August 6, 2006 - 12:39 pm:

Monster 1 Codes

(Please note I have never used the codes for Monsters not being tired so I don't know for sure if they work. I have codes for MAX Bonding but they don't work anymore once the PS2 gets reset)

By Scorpio Maurus on Wednesday, August 9, 2006 - 05:00 am:

Here are the codes for Bromides and Guild Items using AR MAX. I have tested all codes listed here unless otherwise noted. Also you should know using the Default code in AR MAX for filling the book can cause the game to freeze when you try to view the book.


Have Entire Bromide Collection

G58P-YC7P-298C7
NE6K-F5G9-9Y745
R56Z-PRTQ-D1U96
B2PT-KHZG-9WMRA

Have All Guild Items

XUXY-NK53-PFU38
HXYJ-477N-1WQ5V
FU1H-KMAV-46382
9WD1-8B8H-ZZRCC
